com.jgoodies.plaf
Class BorderStyle

java.lang.Object
  com.jgoodies.plaf.BorderStyle
public final class BorderStyle
extends java.lang.Object

Describes the border styles for JMenuBar and JToolBar. Border styles are look-dependent and shadow look-independent HeaderStyle.

Author:
Karsten Lentzsch
See Also:
HeaderStyle
